name: Kea's World: Tselane and the Giant Level 1 Demo
name_original: Kea's World: Tselane and the Giant Level 1 Demo
description: Kea’s World, the first video game from Africa Space Programme, is a fun and engaging children’s video game series created to preserve and celebrate our fast disappearing African Folklore. Follow Kea's World @keasworldvg on all social media platforms.
